WaiWai Won the Startup Track at Conversation 2025 Awards

Jun 26, 2025

WaiWai won the startup competition at the prestigious Conversation conference.

The competition was serious: 18 genAI startups presented their projects across three pitch sessions. Each team had only 6 minutes to convince the jury of their solution's potential.

Based on the pitches, Startup Track partners chose four winners:

  • Yandex Cloud awarded Phygital+
  • Brainbox.vc chose Explyt
  • i-legal recognized HiveTrace
  • WaiWai became Just AI's favorite and received the grand prize.

Conversation is one of the leading awards in artificial intelligence and technology in Russia, which annually brings together the best projects and industry experts. Winning the startup track opens new opportunities for development and confirms the correctness of our chosen direction.

We thank the organizers, partners, and everyone who supports WaiWai.
